short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Drag and drop a CSV file to import it into a Google Sheet

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Save your time! Drag and drop a CSV file to import it into a Google Sheet. You can choose import location option to click extension icon.

!!! ATTENTION !!!
You must have a Google account logged in to Google Chrome and use same account for google sheet. The CSV file is uploaded to the Google Drive of the user logged in to Chrome.
